resources.string: Iwe unofanirwa kumhanyisa app kamwe chete kuti ukwanise kuwana kamera kumashure

Pa Android 11+, usati watanga kurekodha kumashure, iyo application inofanirwa kunge ichimhanya uye ichioneka kamwechete kuti ikwanise kushandisa kamera kumashure. Naizvozvo, mushure mekutangazve mudziyo, ita kuti application ionekwe uye mushure meizvozvo usavhare sevhisi yekurekodha, inofanirwa kuramba iri munzvimbo yekuzivisa.
Vhidhiyo kurekodha kwakamira nekuti kamera iri kushandiswa neimwe application
Kurekodha vhidhiyo kwakamira nekuti kamera yemuchina yakamira kushanda

Iyo kamera yanga ichishandiswa neimwe application. Ndokumbira usamhanye mamwe maapplication angave ari kushandisa kamera uchirekodha vhidhiyo. Android inongobvumira app imwe chete kushandisa kamera panguva

Tatadza kuvhura kamera yakasarudzwa. Izvo zvinoitika kuti haasi ese akavanzika makamera anogona kushandiswa nechero application. Vazhinji vagadziri vanongobvumira kushandiswa kwavo mumashandisirwo avo ekuzvarwa. Kamera yakagara ichavhurwa.
Iyo kamera parizvino (yanga) haipo kuti ivhure pachishandiso chako (kamera system kukanganisa)
Ichi chishandiso hachina kamera yakavakirwa mukati uye haitsigire makamera ekunze. Kuvhara…
Vhura vhidhiyo iripo kubva pakunyorwa pamusoro?
Kubvisa ads, mupiro unofanirwa kunge uri kana kupfuura.
Pazvipo zvidiki, kushambadza kunobviswa chete pachiratidziro chikuru
Ruzivo rwekutenga hausati rwaiswa. Uri online uye wakasaina kuGoogle account yako?
Bvisa ads zvachose nemupiro wenguva imwe chete chero huwandu.
Unogonawo kupa mwedzi wega wega kuti ubvise ads.
Kushambadzira kunobviswa zvachose nepo kunyoreswa kwechero mari pamwedzi kuri kushanda.
Chishandiso hachipi nguva yekuyedzwa yekunyoreswa, sezvo ese mabasa echikumbiro atove emahara, kunyoreswa kunobvisa chete kushambadzira.
Kushambadza kunobviswa zvachose apo kunyoreswa kuri kushanda.
Iko kunyoreswa kunogona kukanzurwa chero nguva (bhatani re \"kanzura kunyoreswa\" richavepo, unogona zvakare kukanzura muGoogle Play application)

Iyo application haina kubviswa kubva kubhatiri optimization. Kana iyo kamera isiri kumhanya kumashure kana chimwe chinhu, wobva wawedzera iyi application kune kunze kweiyo nzira yekuchengetedza simba.
Kana iwe wakadzosera iyo application pa Android 11, ipapo mafaera ekare anofanira kubviswa nemaoko
Wamisa sevhisi yekumashure kuti utange otomatiki kurekodha vhidhiyo. Vhura iyo application kuti uitange zvakare.
Battery optimization -> Ese maapplication -> Tsvaga iyo app -> Usakwidzise /chengetedza
Iyi vhezheni yebeta yekushandisa, saka zvimwe zvinhu zvinogona kusashanda kana kusagadzikana.
Isa iyo yakagadzikana vhezheni kubva muchitoro chekutamba kuti udzivise kukanganisa.
Vhara zvaunofarira application usati watanga kurekodha
Yatadza kubatidza maikorofoni, kurekodha kunoenderera pasina ruzha
Hatina kukwanisa kuvhura zvigadziriso izvi kubva pachishandiso ichi, ndapota edza kuzvitsvaga uchishandisa iyo default mudziyo zvigadziriso zvigadziriso application
G-sensor yaona kuvhunduka, vhidhiyo ichavharwa kubva pakunyorwa
Dzima optimization yebhatiri yeiyi app mune yako kifaa zvigadziriso kudzivirira kukanganisa kwekamera kwemberi
Pane chikanganiso chaitika panguva yekuvhura kamera. Battery optimization yagoneswa
Ndokumbira uise app yewebhu kuti uvhure chinongedzo
Iko hakuna network yekutora kero, kana edza kudzoreredza mudziyo
Tatadza kudzima vhidhiyo faira. Iwe unogona kunge wakadzoreredza application uye mvumo yefaira yakarasika, ndapota edza kuibvisa iwe pachako
Sunungura imwe nzvimbo kuti uenderere mberi kurekodha vhidhiyo
Sikirini huru yechishandiso haina kukwanisa kutangwa nekuti SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (ratidza pamusoro pemamwe ese mahwindo ekushandisa) mvumo haina kupihwa kana skrini yemudziyo yakadzimwa.
Chishandiso chataurwa hachina kukwanisa kuvhurwa kuti chivhurwe otomatiki nekuti \"show pamusoro pezvishandiso zvese\" mvumo haina kupihwa.
Chishandiso hachina kuvhurwa nekuti skrini yanga yakadzimwa (yakakiiwa).
Chirongwa hachina kuvhurwa kuti chitange kurekodha nekuti skrini yanga yakadzimwa (yakakiiwa). Mhanya sevhisi yekurekodha kumashure (AutoStart) kugadzirisa izvi.
Iyo app haina kukwanisa kuvhurwa kuti itange kurekodha nekuti \"show pamusoro pemaapplication ese\" mvumo haina kupihwa. Dzvanya kuti upe
Vhara mamwe maapplication uchishandisa kamera uye wotanga iyi application

Dzima mavhidhiyo ekare, fometa kadhi rako reSD, kana edza rimwe. Zvakare, dzikamisa iyo yakanyanya kurekodha vhidhiyo nzvimbo (shoma iri nani). Nhamba huru yemavhidhiyo akachengetwa anogona kukonzera matambudziko akadaro. Onawo iyo FAQ nezve SD makadhi mune Zvirongwa /FAQ. Iwe unogona zvakare kuedza kunyora kune ndangariro yefoni pane yekunze kadhi
Mira kurekodha. Hapana ndangariro yakakwana yekuenderera mberi
Ndokumbira umire kwechipiri usati wamisa kurekodha pakarepo mushure mekutanga
Kuti uchinje kamera, unofanirwa kumisa kurekodha kwazvino
Saizi yemavhidhiyo ese kubva pahukuru hunobvumidzwa
Iko hakuna kukwana simba rebhatiri pamudziyo. Isa pamubhadharo kana tanga kurekodha kana mubhadharo uri pamusoro pe1%%
Pane chinhu chisina kumira zvakanaka pavhidhiyo rekodha.
Mutauro paki yeTTS (Android Text-to-Speech) haina kuiswa. Batidza internet kuti utange kudhaunirodha
Sevhisi yekurekodha yatadza kutanga. Tinya kuti udzime bhatiri optimization yeapp iyi
Audio inodiwa kurekodha track yekurekodha kana uchirekodha vhidhiyo
Iyo kamera inodiwa kurekodha vhidhiyo uye kamera preview.
Ichi chishandiso chinoda mvumo yekushandisa kamera kurekodha vhidhiyo. Asi wakazviramba. Kuvhara… Edza kupa mvumo kune kamera muzvirongwa zvechirongwa ichi
Iyo nzvimbo inodiwa kudhirowa marongero, kero uye kumhanya pavhidhiyo yakarekodhwa, kana kuratidza iyi data pachiratidziro chikuru (zvichienderana nemasetiro ako).
Zviziviso zvinodikanwa kuti ugone kuratidza sevhisi yekurekodha sevhisi uye mamiriro ekurekodha mune yekuzivisa panhi.
Kuchengetedza kunodiwa kuchengetedza vhidhiyo kune yakagovaniswa folda uye yeloop yekurekodha modhi
Iwe unofanirwa kupa Pedyo Zvishandiso (Bluetooth) mvumo yekurekodha otomatiki chiitiko. Izvi zvinogona kuitwa mumashandisirwo ehurongwa hwekushandisa.
Ndokumbira uedze kusarudza imwe nzira (mudziyo wenzvimbo yekuchengetedza)

Shandisa chete nemahedhifoni eBluetooth. Kana iwe ukabatanidza kune yemusoro unit (redhiyo yemotokari) kuburikidza neBluetooth, saka nekuda kwechimwe chikonzero izvi zvinogona kukonzeresa kufona kune yakajairwa nhamba pachigadzirwa ichi.

Kana ikagoneswa, mamwe maapplication haazokwanisi kushandisa maikorofoni. Kana yakadzimwa, iyi application inogona kusakwanisa kurekodha odhiyo kana akawanda maapplication ari kushanda uchishandisa maikorofoni (Android haigaro bvumidza kushandiswa panguva imwe chete yemakrofoni)
Kurekodha kubva kuCAMCORDER kunogona kusashanda pane mimwe michina, panguva iyi edza kuchinja kuita MIC

Izvi zvinovimbisa kuti CPU (processor) iri kushanda (kugamuchira Bluetooth, kuchaja kana AUX zviitiko).\nUnogona kudzima sarudzo iyi kuchengetedza simba rebhatiri kana kurekodha kusiri kushanda. Mukuita, processor haifanirwe kurara, asi kana izvi zvikaitika pamudziyo wako, wosiya iyi sarudzo yakagoneswa.
Chengetedza CPU iri pa (\"Wake Lock\") yebasa rekumashure \"Watcher\" (inoshandisa mamwe bhatiri simba).
Tanga vhidhiyo kurekodha otomatiki kana app yatanga
Inotanga kurekodha kana bluetooth mudziyo wabatanidzwa. Kuti sevhisi yekutevera yebluetooth itange mushure mekunge mudziyo watangazve, zvinodiwa kuti mudziyo (screen) uvhurwe kana paine password.

Inotanga kurekodha otomatiki kana sisitimu yatanga, mudziyo (skrini) unofanirwa kuvhurwa kana paine password. Mushure mekurodha, zvinogona kutora maminetsi akati wandei sisitimu isati yazivisa application yairi kutanga.
Inotanga kurekodha kana uchichaja. Kuti sevhisi yekuchaja yekuchaja itange mushure mekunge mudziyo watangazve, mudziyo (skrini) unofanirwa kuvhurwa kana paine password.
Inotanga kurekodha kana yabatanidzwa mujeki yekuteerera (AUX)
Mira kana wabviswa kubva kuodhiyo jack (AUX)

Battery optimization inogona kudzivirira app kuti isashande nemazvo (semuenzaniso, kushandisa kamera kana kugadzirisa nzvimbo uchirekodha vhidhiyo kumashure). Dzvanya apa kuti uiregedze kune iyi application izvozvi
Battery optimization inogona kudzivirira chishandiso kubva kushanda nemazvo (semuenzaniso, kushandisa kamera nemakrofoni). Dzvanya apa kuti uiregedze kune iyi application izvozvi
Chiratidzo pakutanga kwekurekodha kweinotevera vhidhiyo faira
Mugadziri wemudziyo anogona kusapa mukana kune ese makamera, saka mamwe anogona kusavhura
Mugadziri wemudziyo anogona kusapa yakakura lens kamera kune ese maapplication
Mugadziri wemudziyo anogona kusapa makumi matanhatu FPS kune ese maapplication
Rega data reGPS nekukanganisa kuri pamusoro
Ratidza yambiro kana GPS neGoogle geolocation zvikavharwa
Ratidza yambiro chete kana GPS yakadzimwa

Pane zvigadziriso pamudziyo wako kubvumira mapurogiramu kuti azvitambe otomatiki uye amhanye kumashure. Dzvanya apa uye wedzera chishandiso kune izvo zvisirizvo (bvumira autostart uye zvichingodaro) kuibvumidza kuti imhanye kumashure uye kana iyo skrini yakadzimwa, kana ikarambidzwa.
Vhura application kana kurekodha kunotanga otomatiki
Tangisa app kana vhidhiyo kurekodha kwatanga
Ne Android 11 zvichikwira, haungakwanise kusarudza chero maapplication akaiswa sezvo iyo system pachayo inorambidza kuoneka kweapp (yakavanzika mutemo)
Gadziridza nzvimbo uchishandisa GPS chete (usashandise network)
Kana iyo yekumhanyisa kukosha yakaipa, saka edza nzira yekare. Kana iyo yakakosha iri zero kana isingawanzo kuvandudzwa, saka edza nzira nyowani
Kuyera pakati pekurongeka kwenzvimbo (marongedzero), kumhanya uye kushandiswa kwesimba rebhatiri.
Iyo yakanyanya kurongeka nzvimbo (marongedzero) uye nekumhanyisa nekuda kwekuwedzera kwekushandisa kwebhatiri simba.
Kudzika kwakadzika kwenzvimbo (marongedzero) uye kumhanya nekuda kwekushomeka kwesimba rebhatiri.
Dzima otomatiki mavhidhiyo ekare uchirekodha kana pasina nzvimbo yakakwana yemavhidhiyo matsva
Nzira yekurekodha haina kusetwa, tinya pano kuti uiise
Vhidhiyo nzvimbo (chengetedza folda), nguva yevhidhiyo, loop kurekodha, G-sensor, GPS
Nzvimbo yemavhidhiyo kurekodha (forodha yekuchengetedza), nguva yevhidhiyo, loop kurekodha, yakakura vhidhiyo saizi
Vimba vhidhiyo kubva kudzima-otomatiki (kuwedzeredza) kana kurova kwaonekwa
Kune zviitiko zveBluetooth zvinogoneka chete kana iyo \"rekodhi chete kana uchichaja\" sarudzo yakadzimwa.

Usatange iyo AutoStart application sevhisi kuchengetedza bhatiri uchimirira zviitiko kuti zvitange kurekodha. Kune Android 8+ izvi zvinogoneka kana zviitiko zveBluetooth chete zvinogoneswa uye zvimwe zvese zvavharwa.

* Unogona kudzima sarudzo iyi kuti app iite otomatiki kurekodha chete kana iyo yekumashure sevhisi (AutoStart) iri kushanda.
-Otomatiki kurekodha kwezviitiko zvakaita sekuchaja, Bluetooth kana AUX zvinogona kuitwa pasina matambudziko kusvika kuAndroid 7.1.
-Kutanga kubva kuAndroid 8+, otomatiki kurekodha pasina yekumashure application sevhisi (AutoStart) inogona chete kuitwa yezviitiko zveBluetooth, uye mune dzimwe nguva (kana uchichaja kana AUX) iwe unofanirwa kutanga watanga iyo yekumashure application sevhisi (AutoStart) - nekutanga. application pachayo kamwe.
-Kutanga ne Android 11+, pasina yekumashure app sevhisi (AutoStart), kuwana kamera pasina kupindirana kwemushandisi kuti utange kurekodha zvinogoneka chete kana mvumo "pamusoro pezvese mapurogiramu" yapihwa.
Kurekodha otomatiki kunyangwe sevhisi yekumashure isiri kushanda (AutoStart)
Tanga kurekodha kana kumhanya kwakaenzana /kukwira (zvichienderana neGPS)
Mira kurekodha kana kumhanya kwadzikira (zvichienderana neGPS)
Yakakura yekurangarira kugona kwemavhidhiyo ese (loop kurekodha)
Pakutanga kweapp, pakuchaja pa/kudzima, pakubatanidza mudziyo weBluetooth, AUX, pabhutsu yemudziyo.
Screen nekukurumidza /kureba kudzvanya, kudzima skrini, kero uye nekumhanyisa kuratidza, popup hwindo, mabhatani uye nezvimwe

Kudimbudzira kuti utange kurekodha, kukurumidza uye kureba kudzvanya pachiratidziri, pop-up hwindo, vibration paunenge uchirekodha, ziviso yekurira, vibration, mabhatani pachiratidziri, kudzima skrini nezvimwe.
Inoshandura otomatiki kamera masikati /husiku modhi panguva dzakatarwa
Yakakwira bitrate - mhando iri nani, asi yakakura vhidhiyo saizi yefaira
Yakawedzera FPS - yakapfava vhidhiyo, asi inokurumidza kupera bhatiri. Zviri nani kuisa kukosha kwekutanga kune yakaderera (yechipiri inogona kuva yakakwirira) kuitira kurekodha zviri nani murima
Kutanga/kumisa kurekodha pasina kuvhura main screen
Inoratidza hwindo rine mabhatani ekudzora pamusoro peese maapplication
Ratidza hwindo rinoyangarara chete kana kurekodha kuri kushanda (uye vhara otomatiki kana yamira)
Haisi kutsigirwa nekamera iripo. Vagadziri vanowanzo rambidza kushandiswa kwayo - inowanikwa chete mune yakajairwa Kamera application
Ratidza meseji paunotanga kana kumisa kurekodha panguva yekurekodha kumashure
Ruzha pakutanga, kumira kana kurekodha kukanganisa
Эти опции могут существенно потреблять батарею и нагревать устройство. Для видеозаписей главное информация о времени, поэтому все GPS опции вполне можно отключить, включая настройки интерфейса
GPX - XML ​​schema yakagadzirirwa seyakajairwa GPS data fomati yesoftware maapplication. Inogona kushandiswa kutsanangura nzira, makwara, uye nzira
Gadzira GPX faira yevhidhiyo yega yega
Fukidzira zvinyorwa zvevhidhiyo: Zuva (nguva), kero yenzvimbo, marongero uye kumhanya
Fukidzira zvinyorwa pamavhidhiyo: zuva (chitambi chenguva), chinyorwa chetsika
Kunyanya kugadziridza, ndiko kukurumidza kwebhatiri kudonha
Mhan\'ara tsikidzi, kuparara kana kupa chinopihwa
Bvumira Anwendung iyi kuti ibude pamusoro pemamwe ese. Izvi zvinodikanwa kuti utange /kumisa kurekodha vhidhiyo kana kuratidza hwindo rinoyangarara
Bvumira Anwendung iyi kuti ibude pamusoro pemamwe maapuro ese. Izvi zvinodiwa kuratidza hwindo rinoyangarara
Dzokera kuchidzitiro chekumba (zvakarekodhwa) kuti uise iyi seti uye tanga sevhisi yekutevera
Batsira kunatsa kana kugadzirisa shanduro yemutauro wako
Chinja icon uye zita rekushandisa muhurongwa
Mushure mekuchinja, application inogona kuvhara, iyo yekare icon ichabviswa pachiratidziro chefoni (kana mune runyorwa rwese maapplication), uye itsva ichaonekwa.
Seta iyo icon uye zita reanovhura
Ratidza kutarisa kwekamera pane main app skrini
Данная камера была скрыта производителем и может не работать

H.265 HEVC uye AV1 macodecs anopa mhando iri nani pane yakaderera bitrate pane H.264 AVC, saka unogona kuchengetedza nzvimbo nekudzikisa bitrate. Asi mavhidhiyo anogona kusatamba mune mamwe mavhidhiyo anotamba
Dzima kana iwe uchida kudzora nemaoko sensor furemu nguva, kuratidzwa nguva, kunzwa, uye aperture
Horizontal mirroring yevhidhiyo. Mufananidzo wacho unochinja chete pakurekodha vhidhiyo, preview haichinji
Resolution, bit rate, kutarisisa, kutarisa, kamera, husiku modhi
Izvi zvinodikanwa kuti uwane yakanyanya kurongeka GPS-yakavakirwa kumhanya, pamwe nekero nemarongedzero. Dzvanya kuti utumire
Inodiwa kuti ugone kuratidza kumashure kurekodha sevhisi uye mastatus pane yekuzivisa panhi. Dzvanya kuti utumire
Kurekodha otomatiki pamusoro pekubatanidza neBluetooth kunoda mvumo. Dzvanya pano kuti utumire
Kuti uwane iyo yekupedzisira-yakafara-ekona kamera (lens), unogona kuseta iyo zoom factor
Parizvino, kurekodha odhiyo hazvigoneke nekuti maikorofoni inotambirwa neimwe application

Kuvanzika: Ese mavhidhiyo aunorekodha anozochengetwa chete pane yako yemuno mudziyo. Chishandiso hachichengetedze mavhidhiyo ako (hachina chinongedzo kumaseva)\n\nIyo app icharamba ichimhanya kumashure (iyo yepamberi sevhisi inoonekwa mubhaa yekuzivisa) uchirekodha uchishanda, paunodzokera kuchiratidziro chekumba, chinja kune imwe app kana kukiya foni yako kuti uenderere mberi kurekodha, uye paunobatidza. maficha ekurekodha otomatiki (kana ukavhara iyo yekumashure sevhisi, aya mabasa haashande). Iyo app inoshandisa Firebase Analytics kune yekutanga isingazivikanwe analytics (ona chinongedzo pazasi)
Vhidhiyo itsva yekurekodhwa ine maodhiyo ekurekodha yatanga
Kurekodhwa kwevhidhiyo kutsva kwakatanga pasina kurekodha
Kurekodha otomatiki vhidhiyo zvichienderana nenguva iripo?
Timer sevhisi yekutanga otomatiki kurekodha vhidhiyo
Bvunza kuti ndeupi mutambi wekutamba naye
Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima iyi vhidhiyo faira?
Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima mafaera aya evhidhiyo?
Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima iyi folda yevhidhiyo?
Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima data dhata revhidhiyo?
Bvisa vhidhiyo iyi kubva pakudzima otomatiki (kubvisa)?
Vhidhiyo faira raendeswa kune rakachengetedzwa folda
Ndokumbira uvhure zvigadziriso zvekushandisa uye ubvumire kupinda kune yekuchengetedza mundangariro yefoni
